name: Piles of Bills
description:
In this game, you are a normal person who tries to make some money. You have to work and you will get experience as you go, but there is a catch, you have to pay bills, if you won't pay, the result might be deadly. It would take dedication and more.
You can upgrade some stuff, but there are side effects.

This game is mostly controlled by your mouse. You have to work and get at least the amount you'll have to pay. Note: there is a timer under the bill. You have to outrun the timer to succeed.

There is no Saving and loading, there is also NO Ending.
